attributes.action: Provide Government grants to businesses for COVID-19 prevention measures
attributes.additional_details:
The protection of UK businesses during this time of crisis is paramount in minimising the impact of COVID-19 to the UK economy. 

If shops & amenities are expected to remain open without contributing to the spread of COVID-19, effective preventative measures need to be installed and maintained.

The provision of a government grant, solely for the use of COVID-19 prevention will ensure that every business can afford to remain open whilst protecting employees and customers.
attributes.background: UK businesses are currently struggling to remain open whilst protecting their staff and customers. Preventing the spread of COVID-19 is becoming a costly operation. We believe that a grant from the UK government would assist companies with funding effective COVID-19 prevention measures.
